column4: HI I have to ask again: I have a HDA Intel card Realtek ID663 chip and cannot get the audio to work on ubuntu Hardy
This is my first time using ubuntu
Anyone could offer assistance? I tried to update all the latest ALSA drivers

It seems no audio people are awake right now.  You should repeat the question (and maybe make it more detailed, if you can) every 20 minutes or so (so new people can wake up).  While you're waiting, you can try the forums (ubuntuforums.org)
